name: Giant Flea
description: The Giant Flea is a small, agile creature capable of jumping impressively. It attaches to its prey and drains their life force.
memorable: It can drain hit points over time while attached to its target, making it dangerous if not dealt with quickly.
goals: To attach to prey and drain their life force.
environment: Various terrains, typically encountered in damp areas.
strengths: Possesses blindsight and keen senses, making it difficult to evade.
weaknesses: Lacks intelligence and charisma, making it straightforward in combat.
attacks: Bite attack that attaches and causes ongoing blood loss.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Sense, allowing it to detect blood within a 60-foot radius.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Has perception checks, but with a +0 modifier, providing no additional strengths.
additional_information: Has damage resistance to bludgeoning attacks.
Can leap up to 30 feet long and 15 feet high.
Can escape without provoking opportunity attacks.
Drains 4 hit points at the start of its turn while attached.
Can detach itself after draining a total of 12 hit points.
test_queries: giant creature that jumps and drains blood
nimble creature found in damp environments
monster that attaches to prey and causes blood loss
agile flea that can leap high
